thread.title: Man in 20s dead after being shot multiple times in Thorncliffe Park - Toronto - CBC News
thread.title_full: Man in 20s dead after being shot multiple times in Thorncliffe Park - Toronto - CBC News

title: Man in 20s dead after being shot multiple times in Thorncliffe Park - Toronto - CBC News
text:
Updated Man in 20s dead after being shot multiple times in Thorncliffe Park The victim found in a back parking lot in life-threatening condition before dying of his injuries CBC News Posted: Feb 25, 2017 6:46 PM ET Last Updated: Feb 25, 2017 9:13 PM ET Police were called to the Thorncliffe Park Drive area near Overlea Boulevard about reports of a shooting just before 6:30 p.m. (Michael Charles Cole/CBC) 
A man in his twenties is dead after he was found suffering multiple gunshot wounds in a back parking lot in the Thorncliffe Park area on Saturday. 
Police were called to the Thorncliffe Park Drive area near Overlea Boulevard about reports of a shooting just before 6:30 p.m. 
That's where paramedics say they located the victim, who had been shot multiple times. 
The man was rushed to a trauma centre in life-threatening condition but within a few hours, was pronounced dead. 
The homicide unit is investigating. 
There is no word on a suspect at this time. 
Thorncliffe Park Drive is closed in both directions as police investigate. 
Update: The male was pronounced in hospital. @TPSHomicide have now taken over the investigation. @TPS53Div #352942 ^CdK
